answers.answer: It's good that you are in counseling.  And I don't see any reason at this point for your doctor to not let you have a mild anti-anxiety med for just those times when you need it.  Lorazepam works great for this, as it is fast-acting and can be taken on an as-need basis.  Ask your doctor.
